title: Automatic Fallback
description: Configure fallback behavior when the main model fails due to rate limit.

enabled.label: Enable Automatic Fallback
enabled.description: When the main model fails due to rate limit, automatically tries another model.

fallbackModel.label: Fallback Model
fallbackModel.description: Model to use when the main one fails.

maxRetries.label: Retries before fallback
maxRetries.description: Number of retries before triggering fallback.

retryDelay.label: Delay between retries (ms)
retryDelay.description: Wait time between retries in milliseconds.

summarization.label: Use AI for Context Summarization
summarization.description: Uses a cheaper model to summarize context before fallback.
